column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This is a fresh review
column2: I still have the left overs with me lol. Â Is it the best pizza in Chicago? No
column3: I mean it is nice but for me
column4: nothing to rave about there are other smaller pizza places that I have tried
column5: that have blown my mind. I just went because every one goes on about it and I guess it's mainly because of the tourists. It is a very touristy restaurant. I still prefer Pizano's over Lou Malnati's and Giordano's. The service is great and the waiter was very attentive
column6: so no worries. It was good that I went and got it out of the way
column7: now I have the experience lol
column8: on to the next. It is safe to say that I won't be going back
